message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay closer to $10,000.  Is there any flexibility in that price?
I understand your position, Bob.  While $13,000 represents a fair price given the value this product offers, I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This is my final offer.
